Key Match Events: Josh Inglis scored 58 runs off 59 balls
Adam Zampa took 4 wickets for 47 runs
Dilshan Madushanka took 3 wickets for 38 runs
MP Stoinis hit a six to seal the match for Australia
Pre-Game Insights: Kusal Mendis hoped the bowlers would know their roles
Finch said Australia need a way to freshen up mentally and physically
Post-Match Reflections: Cummins said the energy in the field was nice to start with and everything else flowed
Mitch Marsh said the experienced guys stood up today and they're away
Miscellaneous Highlights: The bowlers set up Australia's win, Zampa, Cummins and Starc doing all the damage after Sri Lanka had raced away to 125 for no loss
Sri Lanka's batting collapse was described as 'absolutely pathetic' by Maharoof
